answers.author: Charlotte Colley
answers.text:
The City of Dublin hired The Novak Consulting Group to facilitate our Council Retreat in April 2010. The retreat lasted two days and from staff's perspective it went very well. The Council members were also very pleased with Julia Novak's work. They asked her to come back to Dublin recently to assist with a follow-up session to their retreat. I would be happy to share the agenda from the retreat if you are interested.

author: James Nantell
text: I am interested in council team building consultants and examples of agendas used by cities in their team building meetings.
title: City Council Team Building
